scripts.get: wget http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForAdvancedModeling/GeometricShapes/Dodecahedron.x3d; wget http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForAdvancedModeling/Inspiration/ObliqueStrategies.x3d; wget http://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/HelloWorld.x3d; wget http://www.web3d.org/specifications/x3d-3.4.xsd ; wget http://www.web3d.org/specifications/x3d-3.4-Web3dExtensionsPublic.xsd ; wget http://www.web3d.org/specifications/x3d-3.4-Web3dExtensionsPrivate.xsd; wget http://www.jsonix.org/jsonschemas/w3c/2001/XMLSchema.jsonschema; wget http://www.jsonix.org/jsonschemas/jsonix/Jsonix.jsonschema; java -jar node_modules/jsonix/lib/jsonix-schema-compiler-full.jar -generateJsonSchema -compact -logLevel TRACE -d mappings x3d-3.4.xsd -p x3djson -b bindings.xjb
scripts.jsonschema: java -jar node_modules/jsonix/lib/jsonix-schema-compiler-full.jar -generateJsonSchema -compact -logLevel TRACE -d mappings x3d-3.4.custom.xsd -p x3djson -b bindings.custom.xjb
scripts.gen: node js/genJSON.js Dodecahedron.x3d ObliqueStrategies.x3d HelloWorld.x3d Box.x3d; node js/marshal.js Dodecahedron.output.json ObliqueStrategies.output.json HelloWorld.output.json Box.output.json
scripts.rng: xjc -d . -p xmlrng -extension -relaxng xmlschema.rng; xjc -d . -p x3drng -extension -relaxng x3d-3.4.rng
